con:interface.name: EnterpriseSalesRESTSvc
con:interface.con:description: This service provides the interface for creation, updates, submission of sales related shopping cart resources. Consumers can create a shopping cart, and attach cart items as they shopp for products. The resources work in the context of a n activation / renewal / exchanges of products with Telus.

con:method.name: createShoppingCart
con:method.con:description: Consumer need to pass the utlet and sales rep information to create a shopping cart. Customer information is optional to create the shopping cart. Creates a shopping cart for the customer and the sales profile.

con:method.name: updateShoppingCart
con:method.con:description: Can be used to add / modify / remove cartItems from the shopping cart. Update shopping cart for the customer and the sales profile.

con:parameter.con:name: shopping-cart-id
con:parameter.con:description: Pass the Shopping Cart Id generated when creating a shopping cart resource. Shopping Cart Id has to exist to create a cart item.
